11511.content:
Chuckie waddled onto the playground, scrambling around to greet his friends. Tommy turned around. "Hello, Chuckie!" He said cheerfully as he wobbled in the other direction in order to catch a ball. Chuckie followed along. "Is that what we're playin'? Sounds good to me!" He said, stepping forward and pausing suddenly. He felt a tingly, familiar feeling downstairs. Suddenly, a plastic ball came down and almost made contact with Chuckie. "Ahh!" He said, falling over on his rear, looking at the ball. Lil, who had thrown the ball, stepped forward. "Watch out, Chuckie!" She said in his direction, somewhat late.

Chuckie started to get up, then pausing to rub his stomach. "Ooh! Okay, I will next time." He said, bending over to pick up the ball as he heard a strange gurgle. "Ack!" He said out loud as he pressed the ball to his rear end. The other babies came closer. "What's wrong, Chuckie? You're actin' funny." Phil said, crossing his arms. Chuckie walked forward and looked around, sighing. "I gots to...Um, go poopy." He looks away, a bit embarrassed to admit it. Phil and Lil immediately checked each other's diapers and looked back. "So what? Me too!" They both said, snapping the diaper's waistband back where it belonged.

Chuckie pranced in place, pressing the ball a bit harder. "No, no! I'm potty trained now!" He whined, looking at the other babies. "I don't wear diapers like the rest of you no more!" He said, dancing. "I just can't go poopy in em! But I don't wanna stop playing..." He said, looking around and beginning to blush. The other babies began to brainstorm plans.
11511.title: Chuckie Finster it is.

115111.content:
Phil stepped forward. "I know! Just squeeze your butt cheeks! Reeeeal hard!" He said, pressing his palms together at Chuckie, who threw the ball back on the ground in front of the other babies. "Aw, I dunno about this, guys..." He said, beginning to lean side to side, raising his feet as he did so. "You're really not sa'posed to go um, poopy in your underwear..." He said, cupping his rear as he walked towards the others. Tommy seemed curious. "Why's that?" He says, wondering how different underwear could be. Chuckie turned around and pulled down his green pants, showing off a pair of tidy whities with red bands.

Phil looked closer. "It's like a thin dy-pee!" He said, snapping the waistband. "Why can't ya go poopy in this?" He asked, Lil joining in. "Or wee wee?" She looked closer as well. Chuckie rested on his knees. "Ya can't! If ya try to go wee wee or, um, poo poo...Well, dy-pees keep you nice n' clean. Underwear doesn't." He grabbed his rear, pulling up his familiar green pants.

Phil crossed his arms. "Well, I wanna keep playin'. Just try the squeezy thing!" He said, walking back to where he was. Chuckie wobbled foward. "Ohhh...Okay. Um...How long does this work for?" Chuckie asked meekly, Phil only shrugging his shoulders. Chuckie continued playing, enjoying himself, but his bottom was feeling pretty funny. Chuckie caught the play ball and was getting ready to throw it back when he stopped suddenly, bending his knees. "Uh oh! It's comin' out!" He said, trying to think of something to do.

Angelica ran over to Chas and Kira.

"Mr. and Mrs. Finster!" Angelica called to them.

"What is it, Angelica?" asked Kira.

"Chuckie's wearing a dirty diaper!" Angelica told Kira.

"But that's impossible! Chuckie's potty-trained and wearing underwear! Why would he be wearing a dirty diaper?" Chas asked Angelica.

"Acause' he had to poop and he didn't want to stop playing with his friends." Angelica told Chas.

"Did you actually see him wear a dirty diaper?" Kira asked Angelica.

"Well, no." Angelica admitted to Kira.

"Well, then, how do you know he's even wearing it?" Chas asked Angelica.

"Acause' Tommy took off his diaper and gave it to Chuckie. Chuckie pulled down his pants and underwear and put the diaper on." Angelica told Chas.

"Are you sure you're not making this up?" Kira asked Angelica, finding what she said hard to believe.

"Honest, Mrs. Finster. I wouldn't have told you if I hadn't seen it, but I saw Tommy walking around with no diaper." Angelica told Kira, who was still unsure about what Angelica said being the truth.

"Well, Angelica, Chas and I are gonna have to see for ourselves." Kira said to Angelica. She and Chas walked towards the babies, and Angelica chuckled to herself. Her plan to get the babies in trouble was about to succeed. Meanwhile, Tommy had just made it back to Chuckie, Phil, Lil, and Kimi, holding two diapers, a pack of baby wipes, and a bottle of baby powder. He had yet to put his diaper on, since he was still naked from the waist down.

"Here you are, Chuckie." Tommy said to Chuckie.

"Thanks, Tommy. I hope you didn't get into trouble." Chuckie said to Tommy.

"Well, I ran into Angelica. She caught me half-nakie." Tommy told Chuckie.

"What did you do?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Well, I told her about how I gave you my diapie, so she went to tell your mommy and daddy." Tommy told Chuckie.

"What?!" exclaimed Chuckie.

"I'm sorry, Chuckie." said Tommy meekly.

"Oh, neber mind that. Let's just get ourselves changed before my Mommy and Daddy see me wearing a dirty diaper, or you half-nakie." Chuckie told Tommy.

12233331211.content: Marge and Homer had won a second honeymoon in a contest, and needed someplace to drop off the kids while they were gone. The Happy Valley Equestrian Center sounded like the perfect place for Lisa, and she actually begged them to let her attend. The teaser videos that were shown to all prospective child enrollees were very tempting for someone as naive as Lisa Simpson. But once her family had driven off and the facade lifted, Lisa found herself.....
12233331211.title: Lisa Simpson

choices: Yes, she has a bladder of steel!
No, she couldn't wait and peed right where she was.
122333312111.content: Lisa had been excited to attend the facility and looked forward to riding horses and meeting new friends. She had been almost hyper, so waking up felt really weird. When and why had she gone to sleep? Retracing her steps mentally, she had eagerly accepted the chocolate soy milkshake when it was offered. Little did Lisa know that the shake had been spiked with a sedative, diuretic, and laxative. The first stage had knocked Lisa unconscious enough that she didn't even feel the matron undressing her. But when she awoke, her red dress and shoes were gone. She would eventually learn that wearing age-appropriate clothing was a privilege to be earned. Instead, she wore a frilly pink undershirt and a plain white disposable diaper. The shirt had seen many washings yet still held stains from previous "campers". The diapers weren't soft and cute like the ones her little sister wore. They were constructed of very cheap, almost scratchy paper and plastic. "Itchy and Scratchy diapers" indeed lived up to their name. Lisa wondered why she had been diapered, but she didn't need to wait long. The matron walked into the room to check on Lisa. Sticking her hand down the front of the diaper revealed that it was still clean and dry. "Would you like me to bring you a potty?" the matron asked. Lisa wondered why she was being treated as a toddler. "Yes, pwease. Wanna make peepees. Need peepee weal bad." Lisa quickly clasped a hand over her mouth. She was now talking like a toddler. "Okay, now I need to go get the potty for you. Do you think you can hold your peepees until I get back? It may take awhile if someone else is using it." Lisa didn't answer. She felt immense pressure bearing down on her bladder. She didn't know she'd been given a drug that would make it really difficult to wait. Lisa started rocking on the toy horse, but soon realized that didn't help her situation. If anything, the rocking made it worse. If she didn't get to use a potty soon, the diaper she was wearing would fall apart from the sheer volume she was holding back. Does Lisa make it until the matron returns, or does she make peepees in her diaper?

1231222112.content:
It was a normal day in Beverly Hills High, but for three certain girls, normal was a long ways away. The trio, Sam, Alex, and Clover were actually agents of a secret spy organization known as WHOOP. Their mission: to save the world from disaster and get a date to prom. However, their status as agents gave them issues on paranoia. Whenever they would be summoned to WHOOP, it would always be at the most inopportune time. As a result, normal things like going to the bathroom or eating in the cafeteria was met with a justified level of paranoia. As a result, this would explain why the three of them were shaking like leaves in their desks.

They often didn't bother with using the school bathrooms because WHOOP would most likely bring them in anyway. However, there was no mission, so they weren't summoned. All of them wanted to use the bathroom, but if they were WHOOP'ed on the toilet, it would not be pretty. Still, that didn't mean that they wouldn't take risks. As soon as the bell ran, all three girls ran into the closest bathroom and started blissfully peeing.

"Oh man, I swear I was gonna pop!" Alex said as she continued peeing.

"I know. It's not like Jerry to go an entire day without us getting WHOOP'ed." Sam remarked as she struggled to remain dignified while peeing.

"Whatev's! I'm just glad that we didn't piss in our panties before we got here." Clover replied crudely.

When Mike saw Butch teasing Ryan, he decided to help Ryan. Most children Mike's age hated changing diapers, but Mike was used to it. He had a baby sister, and his mom got him to change her diapers all the time. Mike ran up to Butch.

"Leave my friend alone!" Mike told Butch.

"Come on, Ryan. Let's get you changed." Mike told Ryan, and he led him to the bathroom.

"Okay, lay down." Mike told Ryan. Ryan lay down and pulled up his shirt, and Mike got to work untaping his wet diaper.

"Now, don't listen to anything Butch says. He's just trying to hurt your feelings." Mike told Ryan.

"But he's right, I'll never get into big-boy underwear!" cried Ryan.

"Sure you will. When I was your age and my mom and dad were potty-training me, I didn't think I'd ever get out of my diapers, either, but I did, and so will you." Mike assured Ryan as he wiped his bottom clean and powdered it.

"You really think so?" Ryan asked Mike.

"I know so." Mike assured Ryan. He then taped a clean diaper onto Ryan's bottom.

"There you go, all better." Mike said to Ryan.

"Thanks, Mike." Ryan said as he gave Mike a hug.

"It's no trouble." Mike assured Ryan.

"Okay. Just let me know when you're all done, and I'll help you put it back on." Mallory told Alice. Inside the stall, Alice had untaped her diaper and let it fall to the floor. Once it was off, she sat down on the toilet and sighed with relief as she peed in it. She peed until her bladder was empty.

131212212312222122131122112111121.title: But getting the diaper on is the hard part

1312122123122221221311221121111212.title: No, She Had to Poop as Well

13121221231222212213112211211112121.content:
"Are you all done, Alice?" Mallory asked Alice.

"Yes, Mrs. Martindale." said Alice.

"Okay, then let's get your diaper back on." Mallory said as she picked up Alice's diaper. Alice pulled up her skirt and held still as Mallory taped her diaper back onto her bottom.

"Good girl. You keep using the potty like that and you'll be in big-girl panties before you know it." Mallory told Alice as she took her to the sink to wash her hands. Now that Melanie was changed into a clean diaper and Alice used the toilet, they could go back to playing on the swings.

When Alice, Mallory, and Melanie got back to the swings, did Mike get back from using the boys' bathroom?
13121221231222212213112211211112121.title: mallory

131212212312222122131122112111121211.content:
When Alice, Mallory, and Melanie got back to the swings, Mike was there, having gotten back from using the boys' bathroom.

"Hi, Mom. Hi, Mel. Hi, Alice. I came back just like I said I would." Mike told the girls.

"Now, Alice, are you ready for another push on the swing?" Mike asked Alice.

"Yes, please, Mike." said Alice, and she got on the swing. Mallory put Melanie in the baby swing, and Mike pushed Alice while Mallory pushed Melanie. Now that Melanie had her diaper changed and both Mike and Alice used the bathroom, the girls could continue swinging for some time.

What happens next?
131212212312222122131122112111121211.title: Yes

1312122123122221221311221121111212111.content: Did the Johnson Sisters (Jillian, Jane, and Janet) come to the swings?
1312122123122221221311221121111212111.title: Reader's Choice 1

13121221231222212213112211211112121111.content:
Jillian, Jane, and Janet Johnson had come to the swings because they wanted to see which one of them could swing the highest. Jillian was the eldest and was the leader. She was also the brawn. She was constantly in a bad mood and loved to boss other people around. She also hated boys, thinking that girls were superior to them in every way. Jane was the middle sister and was the brains; she wasn't even three years old, but she knew how to read and use the potty by herself. Janet was the youngest, and was the beauty. Janet had no animosity towards boys whatsoever, having an obvious crush on Brad, who unfortunately for her, saw her as annoying and crazy. Alice had a frenemy relationship with the Johnson sisters, especially Jillian. Both Alice and Jillian truly wanted to be friends with each other, but felt they could only do that if one of them changed their ways. Alice wanted Jillian to be nicer to everyone, especially boys, while Jillian thought that Alice should stop spending so much time around boys. When the Johnson sisters got to the swings, to their horror, there were only two empty swings, which meant that one of them would not be swinging. Alice was on the swing Jillian wanted to swing on. Jillian decided to talk to Alice. When Mike saw Jillian, he stopped pushing Alice, not wanting to hurt either girl.

"Oh, hi, Jillian." said Alice.

"Hi, Alice." said Jillian.

"So Jillian, what are you doing here?" Alice asked Jillian.

"Well, my sisters and I are going to see which one of us can swing the highest, and you just so happen to be on the swing I want to swing on." Jillian told Alice.

"Oh." said Alice meekly.

"So are you going to let me on the swing or not?" Jillian asked Alice.

Does Alice let Jillian take a turn on the swing?
13121221231222212213112211211112121111.title: Yes

131212212312222122131122112111121211112.content:
Alice looked back at mike and then back to Jillian "Not till you ask me nicely, cause im currently having fun"

Jillian decided to
131212212312222122131122112111121211112.title: Not Unless She Asks Nicely

1312122123122221221311221121111212111121.content:
Jillian was not about to ask nicely, even if it was to Alice, whom she considered her best friend, for it was in her nature to be bossy and rude. Jillian pushed Alice off the swing, right in front of Mike. Alice wasn't physically hurt, as the padding of her diaper kept her bottom protected, but she was emotionally hurt, and she began to cry. Mike tried his best to calm her down. He then looked over at Jillian.

"That was horrible! Look how you've upset her! You apologize to her right now!" Mike told Jillian.

Did Jillian apologize to Alice?
1312122123122221221311221121111212111121.title: get physical

choices: Made sure alice was taken care of

Mike

choices: "Go ahead and tell them, I dare you!"
1312122123122221221311221121111212111121.content:
Mike looked down at Jillian. He was not happy with her for pushing Alice off the swing and refusing to apologize.

"I am not about to hurt someone who isn't even three years old yet, but if you're not going to apologize to my friend, then I am going to have to tell your parents what you did." Mike told Jillian.

What did Jillian say to Mike upon hearing this?
1312122123122221221311221121111212111121.title: Stood up to her

1312122123122221221311221121111212111122.content:
Jillian didn't like asking nicely, but she still considered Alice her best friend, and wanted to stay friends with her, so she reluctantly decided to ask nicely.

"Okay. Then may I please get on the swing you're using?" Jillian asked Alice in a reluctant tone.

"Well, since you asked nicely, okay." said Alice, and she got off the swing. Jillian got on the swing, but she didn't thank Alice. Still, Alice knew she was happy.

"I'll just find somewhere else to play." said Alice.

"Okay, Alice." said Mike. He then turned to Mallory.

"Okay, Mom. You can take a break now. I'll go back to pushing Melanie.

"Thank you, Michael." said Mallory, and she went back to the park bench as Mike took over pushing Melanie for her.

At the beach, Alice noticed Jillian at the volleyball court, looking unhappy.

"Oh, hi, Jillian." Alice said to Jillian.

"Hi, Alice." said Jillian unhappily.

"What's wrong?" Alice asked Jillian.

"I want to play volleyball, but nobody wants to play with me, not even my sisters." Jillian told Alice. Jillian didn't tell Alice why nobody wanted to play with her; she was both a sore loser and a sore winner.

1312122212.content:
Which of the Johnson sisters do we focus on?

Jillian - The leader of the Johnson sisters, and the brawn. Jillian is three minutes older than Jane, and six minutes older than Janet. Jillian's also the meanest of the Johnson sisters, and is constanly in a bad mood. She hates boys and thinks that girls are superior in every way. Although she delights in picking on her sisters, she objects to anybody else doing it. She has a "frenemy" relationship with Alice, who both truly want to be friends with each other, but feel that can only happen if one of them changes their ways. Alice thinks Jillian should be nicer to boys, while Jillian thinks Alice should stop spending so much time with them.

Jane - The middle sister, and the brains. Jane is three minutes younger than Jillian, but three minutes older than Janet. Jane is the smartest of the Johnson sisters, as she knows how to read, use the potty by herself, and play a toy piano. Like Jillian, Jane thinks that girls are superior to boys in every way (with the exception of Janet). Like Jillian, she has a "frenemy" relationship with Alice.

Janet - The youngest, and the beauty. Janet is six minutes younger than Jillian and three minutes younger than Jane. Janet is the nicest of the Johnson sisters, having no animosity towards boys whatsoever. She has an obvious crush on Brad, who unfortunately sees her as annoying and crazy. Like Jillian and Jane, she has a "frenemy" relationship with Alice.
1312122212.title: Just One

1312122221.content:
Two-and-a-half-year-old Luke O'Reilly was a shy but friendly Irish toddler. He lived with his mom, Colleen, his dad, Connor, and his pet cat, Lucky. Like most toddlers his age, Luke still wore diapers, but he was getting used to using the potty. He became interested in being potty-trained when he saw Lucky using the litter box. He wanted to try it as well, but Colleen caught him and told him that litter boxes are only for cats while potties are for human beings.

One morning, Luke woke up after a peaceful night's sleep in his big-boy bed. Colleen came in to check on him. She had dressed him in a green striped shirt, a clean diaper, red socks, and white sneakers with red stripes.

Where was Luke spending the day today?

Two-and-a-half-year-old Winston Bixby was an adventurous but friendly African-American toddler. He lived with Albert, his father, Geraldine, his mother, Amanda, his six-year-old sister, and Jonathan, his four-year-old brother. Like most toddlers his age, Winston still wore diapers, but was getting used to using the potty. Winston was the nicest of the three Bixby children. He hated whenever Amanda and Jonathan fought with each other, and he didn't want to be like them.

One day, Winston woke up after a good night's sleep in his big-boy bed. His mom, Geraldine, came in to check on him. She dressed him in a purple shirt, a clean diaper, yellow socks, and purple and white sneakers.

131212222221.content:
One-year-old Melanie Martindale was Mike's one-year-old sister. She was younger than the other toddlers, who could all run around and talk. Melanie was also too young to be potty-trained, so as a result, she still wore diapers. She also slept in a crib and drank from a baby bottle. Mike was very glad to have Melanie as his little sister, and he was very protective of her as well. Melanie's goals in life were to walk all by herself and say her first words.

One morning, Melanie woke up after a peaceful night's sleep in her crib. Her mother, Mallory, came in to check on her. She dressed her in a pink hairbow, a pink blouse, a magenta overall dress with a white flower on the front pocket, a clean diaper, yellow socks, and pink Mary Jane shoes.

Where was Melanie spending the day today?

After she wet her diaper, Melanie started crying. Foruntately, Mike heard her and rushed into her bedroom.

"What's the matter, Mel?" He asked her as he picked her up. He soon found out that she was wet and wanted somebody to change her diaper.

"Don't worry, Mel. I'll get you changed." Mike told Melanie. Upon hearing that, Melanie stopped crying. Most children Mike's age hated changing diapers, but Mike was used to it. Mike lay Melanie down and pulled up her skirt. He untaped her wet diaper, slipped it off, and disposed of it. He then wiped Melanie's bottom clean. Melanie was ticklish, so she giggled as her bottom was wiped clean. After that, Mike powdered Melanie's bottom and taped a clean diaper on it.

"There you go, Mel. All better." Mike said, and he gave Melanie a hug.

info.brief_description: This is about your favorite cartoons in diapers together.
info.description:
This Interactive is about your favorite cartoons in a daycare situation and interacting with each other. Now with every story there's a few rules.

1. No Godmodding(Mandatory for every story)
2. No one liner chapters unless its options.
3. Have fun go nuts its your parade for you.
